GSD.description:
ASoC: SOF: Intel: hda-ipc: Do not process IPC reply before firmware boot

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit 48945246cf802b9866f3a821103f1a7a196baf68. For more details please see the references link.
